Member Function Documentation
CarpoolPoints() CarpoolPointsApplication_Green_Quake.ViewModels.TravelPointsUpdate Application_Green_Quake.ViewModels.TravelPointsUpdateCarpoolPoints
async void Application_Green_Quake.ViewModels.TravelPointsUpdate.CarpoolPoints ( )
This function updates the points in the Travel category by six points. It also increments the number of logs logged in the Travel category by one and increments the number of times this particular action was logged by one and sends this data to Firebase.
